ai-mil7.6.4:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, when there was a peak of giant, a single harness, what was the allocation?”
ai-mil7.6.4:1.2_0: “Great king, while going to the house where there is no goods, no matter however many signs, he apprehends no sign.
ai-mil7.6.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a woman or man who is engaged in good families, for some woman or man to observe the sabbath of the females, the influence should not be apprehended in the sign or the opposite sex.
ai-mil7.6.4:1.4_0: This is the origin of the water-pot house, where a cowherd must be caught.
ai-mil7.6.4:1.5_0: The Buddha has given this statement to the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.6.4:2.3_0: When snapped by mounts, he ate in the animal realm,
ai-mil7.6.4:3.1_0: The fourth enquiry is the fourth section.
